casebody.data:
UNION COUNTY
v.
TOWN OF MARSHVILLE No. 411P16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 7, 2018 Karlene Scott Turrentine, S. C. Kitchen, Attorneys at Law, for Town of Marshville. J. Daniel Bishop, Scott A. Hefner, Attorneys at Law, for Union County.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of October 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of June 2018."

Ervin, J. recused
